name: Car Drives Up a Mountain For Some Reason
name_original: Car Drives Up a Mountain For Some Reason
description:
Car drives up a mountain for some reason.

Collect the yellows and reach the green!!

Controls:

W to drive car up a mountain for some reason.

S to reverse car up a mountain for some reason.

A to steer car left up a mountain for some reason.

D to steer car right up a mountain for some reason.

BACKSPACE to reset a car driving up a mountain for some reason.

ESC to exit a car driving up a mountain for some reason.
developers: ᴍ ᴇ ᴛ ᴛ ᴀㅤꜱ ᴇ ᴠ ᴇ ɴ
